segments.text: My eyes immediately go to that overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly a revolting sight, all that water just gushing out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading, soaking into everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand the thought of all that water damage happening right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And she's just standing there, oblivious, with her foot in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's so unsanitary to have standing water like that on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole kitchen must be getting damp and sticky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the thought of stepping into that puddle makes me cringe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children's cookie adventure seems almost secondary to the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to grab a mop and clean everything up immediately.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a truly disagreeable domestic tableau.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of disarray is really quite off-putting.
segments.speaker: PAR
